# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(trema_lib LANGUAGES )

# target
add_executable(trema_lib "")
set_target_properties(trema_lib PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "trema_lib")
set_target_properties(trema_lib PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_compile_options(trema_lib PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(trema_lib PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(trema_lib PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(trema_lib PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(trema_lib PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(trema_lib PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET trema_lib PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(trema_lib PRIVATE
)

# target
add_executable(trema_sample "")
set_target_properties(trema_sample PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "trema_sample")
set_target_properties(trema_sample PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_compile_options(trema_sample PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(trema_sample PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(trema_sample PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(trema_sample PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(trema_sample PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(trema_sample PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET trema_sample PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_sources(trema_sample PRIVATE
)
